autodelete.permission_denied: ‚ùå Only level {level}+ members can manage auto-delete.
autodelete.toggle.disabled: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Command {command} will no longer be auto-deleted.

documentation.sections.overview.title: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Main commands
documentation.sections.moderation.title: üõ° Moderation module
documentation.sections.moderation.conten: /kick ‚Äî kick a user without a ban.
/modlevel ‚Äî assign moderation levels (0 = members, 5 = chat creator; levels control all moderation actions).
/restrict ‚Äî list members with a specific moderation level.
/restrictcommand ‚Äî limit a command to a specific moderator level.
documentation.sections.filters.title: üö¶ Filters
documentation.sections.filters.content.0: /filteradd ‚Äî add a new rule (reply to a message).
documentation.sections.filters.content.4: /filterclear ‚Äî remove all filters in the chat.
documentation.sections.filters.content.5: Use {randomUser}, {randomMention} or {randomRpUser} in templates to mention a random member.
documentation.sections.filters.content.6: Tags {argument} and {argumentNoQuestion} insert text after the trigger (with or without question marks).
documentation.sections.autodelete.title: ‚ôªÔ∏è Auto-delete
documentation.sections.roleplay.title: üé≤ Roleplay

moderation.error.cannot_moderate_admin: Cannot moderate members with equal or higher level
moderation.error.no_permission: You don't have permission to restrict members
moderation.ban.usage:
‚ùå Invalid usage! Examples:
/ban @user 1d spam - Ban user for 1 day
/ban 2h @user - Ban user for 2 hours
/ban @user - Permanent ban
Or reply to a message with /ban 1d
moderation.error.target_admin_funny: Hey buddy, I'm not scared‚Äîwatch your words.
moderation.error.chat_owner_funny: Bold move trying to remove the chat owner!
moderation.error.self_action_funny: That's a bit much‚Äîyou can't restrict yourself.
moderation.mute.usage:
‚ùå Invalid usage! Examples:
/mute @user 1h spam

/mute @user - Permanent mute
